snippet.title: Vagrant Knight Trailer(latest)
snippet.description:
Hi all, this past month I have been hard at work implementing major updates 
and complete overhaul to Vagrant Knight.

In this latest update, I added many new maps,
There are new obstacles as you fight off horde of enemies.

I also added new spells and special attacks to vagrant knight.
Now you have more combination of attacks added to your arsenal
to fend off incoming hordes.

Also in this update, new unique enemies were added.
There are more challenge as different enemy units working together
to take you down.

Update is already live on steam and available here
https://store.steampowered.com/app/2301690/Vagrant_Knight/


#vagrantknight  #gamedev #indiegame #steam #games #gamingnews #gamingupdates
